text:
[Verse]
City lights are shining bright
Dancing through the neon night
Shadows fade and hearts take flight
Lost in dreams until daylight

[Verse 2]
Walking streets with endless glow
Faces I might never know
Music loud and lights aglow
Life in motion fast and slow

[Chorus]
City lights and sleepless nights
Glittering stars in urban skies
Dancing souls that never tire
Burning bright like wildfires

[Verse 3]
Buildings tall and cars rush by
Eager dreams are reaching high
Living fast and asking why
Sky's the limit can we fly

[Bridge]
Moments flash in silver streams
Chasing hopes and endless dreams
In this city of extremes
Live your life by any means

[Chorus]
City lights and sleepless nights
Glittering stars in urban skies
Dancing souls that never tire
Burning bright like wildfires
title: City Lights
